Posts.Content: Hi can anyone help I have been told I should have a delayed reconstruction after my double mastectomy because after the chemo I will be too weak to take an immediate reconstruction.  I'm worried about not having breasts for 6 months and having to take more time off work for a reconstruction next year.  Anybody been through the same thing? love to hear your stories. rdn
Posts.Title: Worried, told have to have delayed reconstruction
